title: Enterprise IT Infrastructure Modernization
description: Comprehensive modernization of corporate IT infrastructure including cloud migration, network upgrade, security enhancement, and managed services. The project aims to improve operational efficiency, enhance security posture, and reduce total cost of ownership over a 3-year period.
requirements: The selected vendor must provide: 1) Cloud infrastructure design and migration services, 2) Network infrastructure upgrade and optimization, 3) Cybersecurity assessment and implementation, 4) 24/7 managed services and support, 5) Staff training and knowledge transfer, 6) Compliance with ISO 27001 and SOC 2 standards, 7) 99.95% uptime SLA, 8) Disaster recovery and business continuity planning

title: Enterprise Data Analytics Platform
description: Implementation of an enterprise-wide data analytics platform to support business intelligence, predictive analytics, and data-driven decision making across all departments. The platform should integrate with existing systems and provide self-service analytics capabilities.
requirements: The vendor must deliver: 1) Scalable data warehouse solution, 2) Business intelligence and visualization tools, 3) Machine learning and predictive analytics capabilities, 4) Real-time data processing, 5) Integration with existing ERP, CRM, and HRM systems, 6) User training and adoption support, 7) Ongoing maintenance and support
